definition: old name for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3]/surname Shen
to extend/to state/to explain/9th earthly branch: 3-5 p.m., 7th solar month (7th August-7th September), year of the Monkey/ancient Chinese compass point: 240°
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: In the application shall be stated the reasons therefor, with relevant evidence attached.
sentences.chinese: 申請書應當載明申請理由，並附有關證據。

sentences.english: We are up to our knees with applications for entry visa.
sentences.chinese: 我們收到很多很多要求入境簽證的申請書。

sentences.english: Please refer to Manulife Investment Solutions Application Form for definition of risk level.
sentences.chinese: 風險水平請參考宏利智富錦囊投保申請書。

sentences.english: We should refer our application back to the manager as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我們應儘快將申請書重新提交給經理。

sentences.english: The application shall clearly set forth causes for application with relevant evidence attached thereto.
sentences.chinese: 申請書應當載明申請理由，並附有關證據。

sentences.english: Heavily Fortified Positions are tougher, and are equipped with a turreted railgun effective against infantry and heavy infantry.
sentences.chinese: 以一個較高的率很重加強的職位產物申請書。

sentences.english: Application Form for Post-Secondary Student Summer Internship Programme in the Government …
sentences.chinese: 香港特別行政區政府專上學生暑期實習計劃申請書。

sentences.english: Please list your occupation on the application form.
sentences.chinese: 請在申請書上註明你的職業。

sentences.english: Bob: Our application is withdrawed this morning.
sentences.chinese: 我們的申請書今早被撤回來了。

sentences.english: Postal applications must be received by 12 December.
sentences.chinese: 郵寄的申請書須於12月12日以前寄達。

sentences.english: The recommender should fill in the recommendation form attached to this application.
sentences.chinese: 請推薦亍依本申請書所附推薦信格開填寮。

sentences.english: We are currently reviewing your application.
sentences.chinese: 我們此時正在審閱你們的申請書。

sentences.english: In some colleges most of them have put in applications.
sentences.chinese: 在一些學校，大部分學生遞交了入黨申請書。

sentences.english: Please submit this application form to the graduate studies office.
sentences.chinese: 將申請書繳回研究生教務組。

sentences.english: Processing of work-based immigration visas is slightly better.
sentences.chinese: 工作類型的移民簽證的申請書審理流程會稍微快些。

sentences.english: Applications submitted directly to Hong Kong Film Archive office will NOT be considered.
sentences.chinese: 直接寄交本辦事處的申請書將不獲受理。

definition: to present/to give/to hand over/to hand in/to lay before
to fill in a form/to write data in a box (on a questionnaire or web form)
to issue (a document)/to sign and issue officially
to report (to the authorities)/to declare (to customs)
